title: Ping Issues
body:
I probably have to sent in a support ticket for an issue like this, but I'll start off here. I play league with a constant ping of 30 - 40 and about three games ago it legit went up to 4000. My last two games it randomly spikes up to max 70 then goes back to a constant 30 - 40. 

Info: 
I play on Macbook Air (macOS Sierra) and my isp is Optimum.

replies.body: You might be experiencing some packet loss. When some of the data going between your network and our servers, if some of that data gets lost or corrupted along to way it can cause those crazy high ping spikes. Use this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to test your network logs for packet loss. Take a screenshot, and shoot it my way so we can go over it together!
